quizzes.question: What value of the text-decoration property substitutes the HTML S tag?

quizzes.textContent:
[h1]The text-decoration Property[/h1]

Another value of text-decoration property is [b]blink[/b] which makes the text blink.

CSS syntax looks like this: [code format="css"]text-decoration: [b]blink;[/b] [/code]
[note]This value is valid but is deprecated and most browsers ignore it. [/note]
